arStrings.szText: When you cast {c_important}Blizzard{/c} it will periodically spawn exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
